segment.source: How to Run a Report
segment.target: How to Run a Report

segment.source: How to Run a Report
segment.target: How to Run a Report

segment.source: How to Run a Report
segment.target: How to Run a Report

segment.source: The process for running a report is the same regardless of the report type.
segment.target: The process for running a report is the same regardless of the report type.

segment.source: When you select a report type in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, the window displays a brief description of the selected report.
segment.target: When you select a report type in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, the window displays a brief description of the selected report.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Reports are not run automatically; you must run them explicitly to generate output data.
segment.target: Reports are not run automatically; you must run them explicitly to generate output data.

segment.source: The length of time it takes to run a report is determined by the amount of data collected in the data store.
segment.target: The length of time it takes to run a report is determined by the amount of data collected in the data store.

segment.source: To run a report
segment.target: To run a report

segment.source: Click the Reports node in the navigation pane.
segment.target: Click the Reports node in the navigation pane.

segment.source: Right-click the desired report, and select Run Report from the pop-up menu.
segment.target: Right-click the desired report, and select Run Report from the pop-up menu.

segment.source: The pages you must complete to run a report vary depending on the type of report.
segment.target: The pages you must complete to run a report vary depending on the type of report.

segment.source: To run a report, complete the appropriate pages from the following list:
segment.target: To run a report, complete the appropriate pages from the following list:

segment.source: Select a Report Period radio button to specify the frequency for running the report.
segment.target: Select a Report Period radio button to specify the frequency for running the report.

segment.source: Specify the start date and end date in the respective fields to determine the range of dates included in the report.
segment.target: Specify the start date and end date in the respective fields to determine the range of dates included in the report.

segment.source: You can enter these dates manually or use the calendar function and select the dates.
segment.target: You can enter these dates manually or use the calendar function and select the dates.

segment.source: Select the Server, Server Group, or Enterprise radio button, and then select the server group and server from the corresponding drop-down list and field as enabled.
segment.target: Select the Server, Server Group, or Enterprise radio button, and then select the server group and server from the corresponding drop-down list and field as enabled.

segment.source: Select the desired application from the drop-down list of applications.
segment.target: Select the desired application from the drop-down list of applications.

segment.source: Click Finish.
segment.target: Click Finish.
